response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value and significance, worth $1,500,000 to you, and we believe it would greatly enhance your endeavors or personal collection. We are offering this remarkable piece at a special introductory price of $1,400,000. This exclusive offer is designed to provide you with a unique chance to own something truly remarkable at a highly favorable rate. We trust that you will appreciate the quality and the value this product brings. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of welcoming you as a distinguished owner of this masterpiece.", "product_price": 1400000}
